PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-17002009-10-01,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of E. VIRGINIA I. McLAUGHLIN of Richmond Hill, Ontario, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective December 18, 2009, in the place of B. Anne Wright.
AttachmentsAttachment
